patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,7 +1,8 @@
 module.exports = {
   // Lint & Prettify TS and JS files
   '*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}': (filenames) => [
     `prettier --write ${filenames.join(' ')}`,
-    `npm run lint --fix . ${filenames.join(' --file')}`
+    `npm run lint --fix . ${filenames.join(' --file')}`,
+    `npm test -- --findRelatedTests ${filenames.join(' ')}`
   ]
 }
